TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ManagementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public MustInherit Class ManagementEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ManagementEventArgs abstract : EventArgs

Docs.summary: Represents the virtual base class to hold event data for WMI events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Context { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value WMI context object containing context information provided by the operation that triggered the event.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
